name: Club Conga
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 under 48h.

Control the game entirely with your mouse. The character follows your cursor.

Left click: Throw Partygoer

Right click: Sprint

Escape: Pause

---

Join together to make the best party possible! Make sure the pests cannot drink all the fruit juice while creating the longest conga line you can imagine! Also, be careful then throwing around your party goers, it can get pretty wild.

---

The Team

Coders: Geoodees, Gwitninm
